Posts.Content: I have just read some of your replies . If you already have back pain then personally I would think twice . My back is still very tight and has been even after months of physio :/
Posts.Title: LD flap - back flap reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi Blaster, I had two mastectomies,one in 2011 and the other last year due to worry of cancer may returning . I was always adamant I wanted to stay flat,but feelings changed when I was flat . I went on to have a double ld flap last September. It was been a very long recovery for me . I'm just starting to think about going back to work now . Every journey is different but mine was full of ups and downs . Having said this I believe I have made the right decision. I wish you well with whatever you decide x
